verses.verse: Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there <S%H3426>was<s%> <S%H7668>grain<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> "Why do you look at one <S%H7200>another?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>"Behold,<s%> I have heard that there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H7668>grain<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> Go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7666>there,<s%> and buy for us from <S%H2421>there,<s%> so that we may live, and not <S%H4191>die.<s%>"
<S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H251>brothers<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H1250>grain<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

But <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>didn't<s%> send <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H251>brother,<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers;<s%> for he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Lest <S%H6435>perhaps<s%> <S%H611>harm<s%> happen to <S%H7122>him.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> those who <S%H935>came,<s%> for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was the <S%H7989>governor<s%> over the <S%H776>land.<s%> It was he who <S%H7666>sold<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and bowed themselves <S%H7812>down<s%> to him with their <S%H639>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and he <S%H5234>recognized<s%> <S%H5234>them,<s%> but acted like a stranger to <S%H1696>them,<s%> and spoke <S%H7186>roughly<s%> with <S%H559>them.<s%> He said to <S%H370>them,<s%> "Where did you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H559>from?<s%>" They said, "From the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%>"
<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5234>recognized<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> but they <S%H5234>didn't<s%> recognize him.

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H2472>dreams<s%> which he <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> about <S%H559>them,<s%> and said to <S%H7270>them,<s%> "You are spies! You have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>"
They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H113>him,<s%> "No, my lord, but your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%>
<S%H5168>We<s%> are all <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons;<s%> we are <S%H3651>honest<s%> <S%H5650>men.<s%> Your servants are not <S%H7270>spies.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H935>them,<s%> "No, but you have come to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of the <S%H776>land!<s%>"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5650>"We,<s%> your servants, are <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> and <S%H6996>behold,<s%> the youngest is this <S%H3117>day<s%> with our <S%H1>father,<s%> and one is no <S%H259>more.<s%>"
<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1696>them,<s%> "It is like I told <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H7270><s%> 'You are spies!'

<S%H2063>By<s%> this you shall be <S%H974>tested.<s%> By the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> you shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6996>here,<s%> unless your youngest <S%H251>brother<s%> comes <S%H935>here.<s%>

<S%H7971>Send<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H3947>you,<s%> and let him get your <S%H251>brother,<s%> and you shall be <S%H631>bound,<s%> that your <S%H1697>words<s%> may be <S%H974>tested,<s%> whether there is <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H854>in<s%> <S%H3808>you,<s%> or else by the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> surely you are <S%H7270>spies.<s%>"
He put them all <S%H622>together<s%> into <S%H4929>custody<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H6213>"Do<s%> <S%H2421>this,<s%> and live, for I <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

If you are <S%H3651>honest<s%> <S%H259>men,<s%> then let one of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> be <S%H631>bound<s%> in <S%H1004>your<s%> <S%H4929>prison;<s%> but you <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H935>carry<s%> <S%H7668>grain<s%> for the <S%H7459>famine<s%> of your <S%H1004>houses.<s%>
<S%H935>Bring<s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H1697>me;<s%> so will your words be <S%H539>verified,<s%> and you <S%H4191>won't<s%> die." They did <S%H6213>so.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> "We are <S%H61>certainly<s%> <S%H818>guilty<s%> concerning our <S%H251>brother,<s%> in <S%H834>that<s%> we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6869>distress<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> when he <S%H2603>begged<s%> <S%H8085>us,<s%> and we wouldn't listen. Therefore this <S%H6869>distress<s%> has come upon <S%H935>us.<s%>"

<S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H559>"Didn't<s%> I tell <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H2398><s%> 'Don't sin against the <S%H3206>child,<s%>' and you <S%H8085>wouldn't<s%> listen? Therefore <S%H1818>also,<s%> behold, his blood is <S%H1875>required.<s%>"
They <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H8085>understood<s%> <S%H3887>them;<s%> for there was an interpreter between them.

He turned himself <S%H5437>away<s%> from <S%H1058>them,<s%> and wept. Then he returned to <S%H7725>them,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3947>them,<s%> and took <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> from among <S%H631>them,<s%> and bound him before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> gave a <S%H6680>command<s%> to <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H3627>bags<s%> with <S%H1250>grain,<s%> and to <S%H7725>restore<s%> each <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3701>money<s%> into his <S%H8242>sack,<s%> and to <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H6720>food<s%> for the <S%H1870>way.<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> it was done to <S%H6213>them.<s%>
They <S%H5375>loaded<s%> their <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> with their <S%H7668>grain,<s%> and departed from <S%H3212>there.<s%>

As <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H6605>opened<s%> his <S%H8242>sack<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H2543>donkey<s%> <S%H4554>food<s%> in the lodging <S%H4411>place,<s%> he <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H3701>money.<s%> <S%H6310>Behold,<s%> it was in the mouth of his <S%H572>sack.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> "My <S%H3701>money<s%> is <S%H7725>restored!<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> it is in my <S%H572>sack!<s%>" Their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H3318>failed<s%> <S%H2729>them,<s%> and they turned trembling <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "What is this that <S%H430>God<s%> has done to <S%H6213>us?<s%>"

They <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> him all that had <S%H7136>happened<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> saying,
"The <S%H376>man,<s%> the <S%H113>lord<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H7186>roughly<s%> with <S%H5414>us,<s%> and took us for <S%H7270>spies<s%> of the <S%H776>country.<s%>
We <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3651>him,<s%> 'We are honest <S%H7270>men.<s%> We are no spies.

We are <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of our <S%H1>father;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> is no <S%H6996>more,<s%> and the youngest is this <S%H3117>day<s%> with our <S%H1>father<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>'

The <S%H376>man,<s%> the <S%H113>lord<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3045>us,<s%> 'By this I will know that you are <S%H3651>honest<s%> <S%H3240>men:<s%> leave <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> with <S%H3947>me,<s%> and take grain for the <S%H7459>famine<s%> of your <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and go your <S%H3212>way.<s%>

<S%H935>Bring<s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H3045>me.<s%> Then I will know that you are not <S%H7270>spies,<s%> but that you are <S%H3651>honest<s%> <S%H5414>men.<s%> So I will deliver your <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H5503>you,<s%> and you shall trade in the <S%H776>land.<s%>'"

It happened as they <S%H7324>emptied<s%> their <S%H8242>sacks,<s%> that <S%H376>behold,<s%> each man's <S%H6872>bundle<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%> was in his <S%H8242>sack.<s%> When they and their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> their <S%H6872>bundles<s%> of <S%H3701>money,<s%> they were <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7921>them,<s%> "You have bereaved me of my sons <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> is no <S%H8095>more,<s%> Simeon is no <S%H3947>more,<s%> and you want to take Benjamin <S%H1144>away.<s%> All these things are against me."

<S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4191>"Kill<s%> my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> if I <S%H935>don't<s%> bring him to <S%H5414>you.<s%> Entrust him to my <S%H3027>care,<s%> and I will bring him to you <S%H7725>again.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H1121>son<s%> shall not go <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H251>you;<s%> for his brother is <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and he only is <S%H7604>left.<s%> If <S%H611>harm<s%> <S%H7122>happens<s%> to him along the <S%H1870>way<s%> in which you <S%H3212>go,<s%> then you will bring <S%H3381>down<s%> my gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%> with <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>"
